title: Unbound Bike Check: Morgan Aguirre’s Unreleased Orbea Terra Gravel Bike
content:
What appears to be an unreleased Orbea gravel bike features a carefully sculpted frame, new aero tube shapes, and slim tire clearance.

Read the full article at Unbound Bike Check: Morgan Aguirre’s Unreleased Orbea Terra Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
